	charset="iso-8859-1"

I'm surprised, Daniel.  I'm very surprised.  First of all, what the hell ma=
kes you think that there are people trying to seem like hackers.  Now, sinc=
e you obviously don't understand the situation, I guess I'm going to have t=
o say that I, no surprises, am "Dave Finnamore".  Geez, I wasn't trying to =
impersonate you!  I'm not trying to have some sick sort of fun!  Also, I do=
 not even want to appear as a "hacker", I have the decency not to do it.  A=
nd I am no child, and my acts sure as hell aren't childish.  Do you even un=
derstand why I used cardhead's, starcasm's and your email addresses?  First=
 of all, you guys never post, so I thought I'd raise the horrible post coun=
t we've been getting.  Also, do you think it was "fun" for me to do this?  =
No, as I claimed before, it wasn't "fun".  It was strictly business that ha=
d to be done.  Maybe if you learn not to jump to conclusions and try to cre=
ate a picture about somebody who you will never know, you wouldn't have to =
get angry.  And, if YOU have any decency, you'll be just like rAuq, cardhea=
d, and Starcasm and not get all childishly fed up about it.  And until then=
, go kiss the nWo's ass.

-------------------------------------------------=
-------------------------------------
The preceding announcement has been p=
aid for by the 
New World Order
